name: Paildramon
description: Paildramon is a fused form of ExVeemon and Stingmon, combining features from a Dragon and Insect type. It wears the latter's exoskeleton as armor on the thighs, arms and torso, and the "X" symbol can be partially seen. Its face is concealed by a red and black helmet with a crest around the eyes. It has two pairs of wings and the "Desperado Blaster" cannons are located on its lower midsection.
